Description: Necklace: comprising many tiny dark-purple glazed composition cylinder disc beads, some larger shell cylinder disc beads, one central dark-purple glazed composition fancy spheroid bead, and eight green-blue glazed composition moulded cylinder beads.
Curator's comments: Also from this burial: amuletic string (1926,0728.173), beads (1926,0728.168 & 1926,0728.170 & 1926,0728.171 & 1926,0728.174), pendant with beads (1926,0728.175), seal with beads (1926,0728.169). Bibliography: H. Frankfort in 'Journal of Egyptian Archaeology' 16 (1930), 218, briefly refers to this burial.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (284)
